title: My game crashes my computer
body: Ok so I played a few games then fell asleep but when I woke up and started my league up every time I entered a game it would crash my computer and I'd have to restart. I've tried deleting and downloading several times and repairing. I don't know what is causing it and why it is suddenly happening but all help is appreciated

replies.body: I'd like to help but I need some more info!  What do you mean by crash?  For example, where exactly is it happening?  Do you receive any errors and what does it say?  Did you recently update Windows 10?  Let me know!

Crash as in my computer freezes and nothing works like I can't close or do anything but power down my computer. I don't receive errors or warnings. And I updated to Windows 10 a while before patch 6.10 came out
Does this happen like as soon as you get in game? I might have the same thing happening to me
Yes everything works 100% client, launcher. But as soon as I spawn into a game my computer freezes and there is no way to close it or anything besides long pressing the power button on my computer

Thanks, this detailed information helps a lot!  As a first step, I've seen players having a freezing issue like this after the Windows anniversary update, which is why I asked.  Some players were able to resolve it by disabling the[ game bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html)that came with the update.  If that doesn't help, then you may have outdated drivers or corrupt game files causing this.  Go over our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to help, starting with updating your drivers.  

Test out in custom games to prevent any account penalties.  Let me know how things work out for you!
You sir are genuinely a lifesaver. thank you so much because it was the game bar freezing my game so I would've never figured it out. Once again thank you and I wish you the best of luck
Does it crash other games? Or just League?
